channel.title: [new game] nuke fest
channel.description:
Well, I was bored one day on the IRC and decided to make an online game where you nuke other countries! I am currently working on a registration and figuring out how to sync all the images together.
The object of the game is to be the country with the highest population and the end of a round. Every time a nuke goes off, the fall out will effect the population, and so will the initial blast. I am going to have a blast working on this. When I complete it, I will release this open source onto a website I will make.
If you have any ideas on how to make the images sync to all clients, please let me know. Post any ideas you may have :)
[b]PS - If this is not aloud in this section, please just lock it lol. I wont be hurt[/b]

item.title: [new game] nuke fest
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

[quote=“AMERIKA, post:12, topic:283724”][quote author=Umah link=topic=374974.msg2835776#msg2835776 date=1245640227]
Here is a storyline when nuking I made up in 5 minutes or so. The Bold parts is where you can change the text or something.

Country: America ran by: Obama - Attempts to nuke Country: Japan ran by: Jacki Chan.
Airplanes take off to Japan, and successfully drops the nuclear bomb.
…
Nuke destroys half the country, killing 80,000 people! Nice hit!
[/quote]
Eh, thats decent idea of a layout. Thanks, I may work with a bit of that lol. There were a good amount of variables you placed, aswell. Later, when I get the graphics and stuff like that working, I may add more variables such as anti-nuke security systems, bomb malfuctions, et cetera. Thanks.

Btw, Jacki Chan or w/e is actually Chinese lol.[/quote]

Hehe, i know, just an example lol. Jacki Chan could woop you :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2009, 11:19:43 pm[/size][hr]Lol, I made a funny one for security system.

You attempt to hack into Iraq’s computer system.
…
You fail, and get a message saying "Nice try America, but you need to figure out our 1 digit password! I’ll give you a hint, it’s what John McCain hates the most.
…
You attempt to hack into the system again. This time, you have to think… What is the thing John McCain hates the most? You saw this on t.v once… All of the sudden you remember! You type in “Women”, and your in!
…
Once your through, you gather as much information on Iraq as you can, and get the hell out of Iraq!

End :D, remember made this for fun lmao…

Read full topic

item.title: [new game] nuke fest
item.dc:creator: @Eonix Eonix
item.description:
@Eonix wrote:

lol u have to play chess to earn gold for nukes and upgrades
then when you do a certain thing (molesters goes up 70% ur population grows even faster)
then have fast time like
1 hour = 2 sec
1 day = 48 sec
1 week = 336 sec (1 min 36 sec)
ect.

i would add some moparscape members as characters as suggested
and need to have storyline
i can come up with one if u want

item.title: [new game] nuke fest
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:283724”]What are you writing this in?

You saw that flash animation on IRC so wound it be possible to make the playable character famous Dictators like Hitler, Hussain etc. or even some members from this community.

Taharok nukes AMERIKA… Taharok gets -10 points.[/quote]
No, I was thinking more like this:

America run by AMERIKA nukes China run by Taharok

  • Initial blast kills 20,000 people
    .
    …
    …
    …
    .
  • Fallout kills 100,000 next year

et cetera lol

item.title: [new game] nuke fest
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

Taharok:

What’s the strategy behind the game? And, is it 2d, 3d, what?

I was thinking 2D with decent graphics.

The plot behind the game would to try and defeat other countries in a nuclear war. There will be rounds (haven’t really thought of a time for each round), and to develop nukes, you need to will need to do something that I really haven’t thought much about lol. Give me ideas! gogooggo

Read full topic
